body_text:
The 1px transform is entirely visual. I thought it looked a little bit better raised up.
The -moz- prefix hasn't been needed since Firefox 16. I think we can safely leave it off.
Plus, the preferred way for us to deal with prefixes is something like autoprefixer, which would just deal with all this.

The 1px transform is entirely visual. I thought it looked a little bit better raised up.

The -moz- prefix hasn't been needed since Firefox 16. I think we can safely leave it off.

Plus, the preferred way for us to deal with prefixes is something like autoprefixer, which would just deal with all this.
